name: Finnish Energy - Energiateollisuus ry
goal:
• improve the citizens welfare and the competitiveness of businesses by developing energy markets and securing energy supply in consideration with environmental and societal values
• promote use of district heating and electricity as a solution to environmental problems and to meet the demands of higher energy efficiency
• enhance the image, competitiveness and operational preconditions of energy businesses contributing in Finland
interests: Climate Action, Competition, Energy, Environment, Research and Technology, Taxation, Trans-European Networks, Transport
euInitiatives:
Energy Union
Climate and energy framework 2030
Emissions trading system
Review of the Energy efficiency directive
Review of the RES directive
Electromobility
Heating and cooling strategy
Bioenergy policy
Energy market
